üì¢ Update: Stylish Action HUD v1.5.4

‚ú® New Features (v1.5.4)
* **Quick Action Menu Positioning (Long-press Drag)**: You can now reposition the Action Menu without entering Layout Mode. Simply long-press (hold for 0.4s) anywhere on the Action Menu to drag it. Releasing it will automatically save the new position.

üõ† Bug Fixes (v1.5.4)
* **Status Effect Settings**: Fixed a bug where Animation and Blend Mode dropdowns were empty in the Status Effects configuration tab.
* **Layout Mode Exit Fix**: Resolved a critical issue where HUD elements remained draggable/unlocked when exiting Layout Mode via the toolbar button.
* **Toolbar Save Action**: Exiting Layout Mode via the toolbar button now correctly saves changes instead of discarding them.

--- 

üéÅ Earlier in v1.5.3 & v1.5.2
* **Restored sidebar settings button**: Restored the missing button to access the configuration from the sidebar menu.
* **Split configuration permissions**: Separate role thresholds for editing Tracking, Style/Layout, and Menu settings.
* **Auto-populate & Auto-add PCs**: Automatically manages Party HUD members on new installs or PC creation.
* **Fixed Layout Drift**: HUD positions now remain consistent across different screen aspect ratios and sizes.
* **Flicker-Free Turns**: Optimized DOM rendering to eliminate visual flicker during combat turn changes.

--- 

üéÅ Earlier in v1.5.0
* **Dynamic Portraits**: Character portraits react to Status Effects (Poisoned, Dead, etc.).
* **Font Customization**: Customize Header and Body fonts independently.
* **Macro Description Editing**: Right-click any macro to customize its tooltip flavor text.
* **Per-Actor Card Scale**: Adjust individual card sizes (e.g., 0.6x for familiars).

announcement.content: New: Long-press to drag the Action Menu! Also fixes Status Effect dropdowns and Layout Mode save issues.
